name: Arlecchino
title: "Dire Balemoon" Arlecchino
desc: Solitary Balemoon in a Sky of Fading Stars.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Arlecchino to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Invitation to a Beheading
skills.desc: Deal 2 Physical DMG. If possible, consume up to 3 stacks of the target's Bond of Life and increase DMG by the same amount.

skills.name: All Is Ash
skills.desc: Create 5 stacks of Blood-Debt Directive on the opponent's side of the field and deal 2 Pyro DMG.

skills.name: Balemoon Rising
skills.desc: Deal 4 Pyro DMG. Remove all of your stacks of Bond of Life and heal yourself for 1 HP per stack.

skills.name: The Balemoon Alone May Know
skills.desc: Characters won't receive healing from sources other than Balemoon Rising. When Bond of Life is attached to self: Physical DMG dealt by characters is converted to Pyro DMG.
